sentences.en: Annoy irritate bother irk vex provoke aggravate peeve rile.
sentences.cn: Annoy使生气,使烦恼,打搅,干扰.

sentences.en: By midday the irk of his pack became too oppressive.
sentences.cn: 走到中午的时候,累赘的包袱压得他受不了.

sentences.en: Does baggy clothes irk your parents?
sentences.cn: 穿松垮垮的衣服会不会让你父母讨厌?

sentences.en: The rehearsal process also irked him increasingly.
sentences.cn: 排练过程也更加让他厌烦。

words.tran_cn: 令人厌烦的，讨厌的；令人厌恶的

trans.tran_en: if something irks you, it makes you feel annoyed
